attributes.additional_details: Our country is facing a ‘perfect storm’ of circumstances that will have a significant impact on our economy, the supply of fresh food, medicines and other goods, and the health and well-being of our citizens. A new strain of Covid-19 running rampant across the SE of the UK, border closures with many of our biggest trading partners and the prospect of a no-deal Brexit could have significant and lasting effects on the UK. The transition period should be extended.
attributes.background: The combination of a new, more transmissible strain of Covid-19, the imminent prospect of a no-deal Brexit, and border closures, have given rise to a set of circumstances that necessitates asking the EU for an extension to the transition period.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for the same action:

Request a short term extension to the Brexit transition period: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564523

To Seek a 1 year Extension to the Brexit Transition Period & a Second Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554492
